title: GET_ENTITY_SPEED
content:
0x9E1E4798// GetEntitySpeed
float GET_ENTITY_SPEED(Entity entity);Parameters:entity: The entity to get the speed ofReturns: The speed of the entity in meters per secondGets the current speed of the entity in meters per second.To convert to MPH: speed * 2.236936
To convert to KPH: speed * 3.6
codeBlocks:
To convert to MPH: speed * 2.236936
To convert to KPH: speed * 3.6
